name: cleanup AWS service last accessed details

statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(p:AWSPrincipal) WHERE p.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG SET p.last_accessed_service_name = null, p.last_accessed_service_namespace = null, p.last_authenticated = null, p.last_authenticated_entity = null, p.last_authenticated_region = null
